snippet: The former Algerian foreign minister, Lakhdar Brahimi, will replace Kofi Annan, who resigned in frustration two weeks ago over his inability to advance his plan to halt the Syrian conflict.
lead_paragraph: The former Algerian foreign minister, Lakhdar Brahimi, will replace Kofi Annan, who resigned in frustration two weeks ago over his inability to advance his plan to halt the Syrian conflict.

headline.seo: Lakhdar Brahimi, Algerian Statesman, to Succeed Kofi Annan as Special Syrian Envoy
headline.main: Veteran Algerian Statesman to Succeed Annan as Special Syrian Envoy
headline.print_headline: Veteran Algerian Statesman to Succeed Annan as Special Syrian Envoy
